author: Bobbie Whiteman For Dailymail.Com
title: Kourtney Kardashian shows off slender pins in leggings | Daily Mail Online
text: Share The multi-tasking mother was glue to her phone the whole time. Kourtney has shed pounds and tightened up their enviably slender figure to attain the perfect revenge body. Such a chatterbox: The 37-year-old strolled along with her phone glued to her cheek Making sure she stays hydrated: The beautiful brunette carried a large take-out beverage Earlier, sister Khloé Kardashian, 32, shared Snapchat photos of herself and Kourtney working out with their trainer in a gym. The three photos show the sisters in athleisure wear as they take on a series of tough exercises. Khloe, who stands a statuesque 5ft 10ins, showed off her curves in a skin-tight black and green body suit. She dwarfed Kourtney, who made the most of her physique in a fitted T-shirt and shorts. And push: Khloé Kardashian shared Snapchat photos of herself and sister Kourtney working out with their trainer on Friday And pull: The 32-year-old blonde and her brunette sibling worked on strengthening their arms and their cores Kourtney shares her three children Mason, seven, Penelope, four and two-year-old son Reign with her ex-fiance Scott Disick. They split mid 2015 when his hard-partying ways got too much for the Kardashian. And it's no secret that the beautiful brunette has honed her own revenge body to get her own back on the 33-year-old. In one picture, the sisters are pulling back on elastic bands to strengthen their arms and their cores. Feline fine: Khloe added a pussycat filter to this Snapchat of Kourtenay, turning her into a cute smiling kitten In another they are doing backwards push ups in a sitting position off the knees of their workout partners. The third. more whimsical photo shows a smiling Kourtney with a pussycat filter over her face, giving her cute cat ears, eyebrows, a little black nose and whiskers. Fans can catch the 13th season of Keeping Up With The Kardashians when the reality show returns to E! for its 13th season on March 5. Mom's munchies! Kourtney took to Instagram later in the evening and shared an adorable snapshot as she chowed down on chips with daughter Penelope, four Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
